name: istps2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))

stmt.origin: bitri(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
stmt.pretty: bitri(c0 ∈ TopSp, (c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ (c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ (c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔ c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
-| wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))
⊣ (c1 ∈(TopOn ` c2)↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)

body.origin: |- wb(wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(c2, cuni(c1))))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧ c2 = ⋃ c1))
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)

comment: Express the predicate "is a topological space." (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.)
